tag.name: var
tag.description: ontent is the text to be analyzed (required if no contentUri)

tag.name: var
tag.description: contentUri is a URL to content that will be analyzed (required if no content)

tag.name: var
tag.description: language is the language of the content (optional)

tag.name: var
tag.description: multiPartContent contains content for multipart packaging. Private to prevent processing by the serializer

tag.name: var
tag.description: fileName is the name of the file containing content to be analyzed

docblock.description: Setter for multiPartContent. Clears the content and contentUri properties if it contains data
Loads a file into the object.
docblock.long-description: The file will be read as bytes; the appropriate conversion will be determined by the server.

tag.name: param
tag.description: : Pathname of a file acceptable to the C{open} function.

docblock.description: Loads a string into the object.
docblock.long-description: The string will be taken as bytes or as Unicode dependent upon its native type and the data type asked for; if the type is HTML or XHTML, bytes are expected, the encoding to be determined by the server.

docblock.description: Sets a property based on the name.
Gets a property value based on the property name.
Provides default multiPart call for child classes that don't implement it
Recursively removes empty properties to facilitate json encoding.

docblock.description: Checks for the signature values of gzip and bzip2

docblock.long-description:
Api php Client Binding API; representation of a Api server. Call instance methods upon this object to communicate with particular Api server endpoints. Aside from ping() and info(), most of the methods require the construction of either a DocumentParameters object or an NameTranslationParameters object. These provide the content data that will be processed by the service.
usage example: $api = new API($service_url, $user_key)

docblock.description: URL of the Rosette API (or test server).

tag.name: param
tag.description: An authentication string to be sent as user_key with all requests.

docblock.description: Sets on override Request for mocking purposes
Sets the maximum retries for server connect
Sets the millisecond sleep time between retries
Adds custom headers to headers array if there are any
Replaces a header item with a new one
Internal operations processor for most of the endpoints.

parse_markers.error: Name of argument $user_key does not match with the DocBlock's name $service_url in __construct()
Name of argument $service_url does not match with the DocBlock's name $user_key in __construct()
Name of argument $ms_between_retries does not match with the DocBlock's name $max_retries in setMillisecondsBetweenRetries()
parse_markers.notice: Parameter $max_retries could not be found in setMillisecondsBetweenRetries()
parse_markers.error: Name of argument $header does not match with the DocBlock's name $headers in setCustomHeaders()
parse_markers.notice: Parameter $headers could not be found in setCustomHeaders()
parse_markers.error: Argument $old_header_item is missing from the Docblock of replaceHeaderItem
Argument $new_header_item is missing from the Docblock of replaceHeaderItem
